Opportunity Title: Infrastructure Architect
Sourcing Office: Calgary
Specialization: Network and Infrastructure
Project Description: 6 month contract for an 'Infrastructure Architect' our client requires immediately.
You will be responsible for the design of infrastructure related project including desktop services, server and network implementation, telecommunications, storage, systems management and data centre management.
You will set the technical direction and forecast areas of opportunity. Identify technical and procedural risks on a go-forward basis.
Must Have:
Hands-on Infrastructure Experience. (> 10 years)
Infrastructure Architect Experience - at the design level. (2 - 4 years)
Experience with Active Directory, Linux, SAN, IP networking, VPN, Exchange. (Mandatory)
Leadership experience in large IT environment. (Mandatory)
Strong understanding of Unix environments and applications. (Mandatory)
Nice To Have Skills:
Start Date: Sep 14, 2009
End Date: Mar 12, 2010
Work Environment: Client is located outside of the Calgary downtown core.
If you are interested and qualified for this opportunity, Please browse the following link
https://www1.sisystems.com/index.cfm?mg=cpo.details&uv=%25%260%27X3LD%20%0A
to view the complete opportunity and apply online, it takes less than a minute
(Using this link allows your application to be recorded directly with the client request and forwards your resume, skills matrix and reference information directly to me, from our database, for priority consideration on this opportunity. Applications will not be accepted by phone.)
Note: Posted rates are for incorporated contractors only. Pay rates differ for sole proprietorships and employees placed in contract positions.
